name: CDC Immunization Related Requirements Test Plan (CNI) v4.1
description:
This test plan is to be used for the testing of the CDC EHR Immunization Related Requirements developed under Contract-No: 200-2014-60994 . All test cases are required to be executed. The test plan includes both functional and interoperability tests including Vaccine Update Notifications (HL7 V2.5.1 VXU/Z22) and Query and Response (Evaluated History and Forecast Group Z44/Z42).
This release is updated to correct test plan errors related to MMR records and to correct validation issues with test messages.
